name: Share of men who prefer a male boss (Gallup (2017))
description: The share of men responding to the question 'If you were taking a new job and had your choice of a boss would you prefer to work for a man or a woman?' and answered they prefer a male boss.

source.name: Gallup (2017)
source.dataPublisherSource: Results are based on telephone interviews conducted November 2-8, 2017 with a random sample of –1,028— adults, ages 18+, living in all 50 U.S. states and the District of Columbia.
source.additionalInfo:
Question posed to respondents: If you were taking a new job and had your choice of a boss would you prefer to work for a man or a woman?

Possible answers included: prefer man boss, prefer woman boss, no difference, and no opinion. 
We report the first two responses to this question.

For more information on the Gallup Poll see the link above.
